TopicTitle: Can anyone tell me which mod had the cubic RTG?

Articles.Content:
I don't remember which mod had the Cubic RTG's? The ones that looked like an ASRG?

Anyone know what that mod was.

That one is NearFuture think has the one your looking for.

EDIT- ![DItF9X9s.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/DItF9X9s.jpg)

EDIT- There was RLA MMRTG but can't find a good page for them anymore.

EDIT- You might try RLA

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-02T02:53:58Z" title="04/02/2015 02:53  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 2, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**

> 
> That one is NearFuture think has the one your looking for.

I didn't think so. I am looking for a more stock-alike one.

More cubic. And bigger....

EDIT POST: found it. It was from an older version of RLA stockalike.
